full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL YE SHES KYIS MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE GDONG PA CAN GYIS BSKANG BSHAGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES YE SHES KYIS MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE GDONG PA CAN GYI BSGRUB THABS BSKANG SO RIM DGRA BGEGS DPUNG 'JOMS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SKIU GONG MAR RTZE GCIG TU SGRUB PA NYING POR MDZOD CIG ,SKU TSE 'DIR YANG LUNG RTOGS YON TAN DANG LDAN PA'I MGO LAN ZHABS DRUNG RIN PO CHE NGAG DBANG DPAL BZANG PO'I GSUNG NAN CES PA'I NGO MCHOG PAR, ,RGYAL BA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO'I BKA' LUNG GIS DZA YA PAndI TA KHU THAG THU ZHES 'BOD CING SKU SKYES BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS, ,SANG RABS BSAGS PA RNAMS KYI GZUNG RGYAN RGYUN LTAR RGYAL PO'I PHO BRANG CHEN PO'I CING GI NYE 'DAB SU SBYAR BA'I MTHUS RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,)
